hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export MAINTAINER="Jenkins Admin" export MAINTAINER_EMAIL="jenkins@subut.ai" export TRAYDIR="/tmp/jenkins_slave/workspace/tag.builders/tray_linux.subutai-io.tag" export QTBINPATH="/home/builder/qt_static/bin/" Version="$(git describe --abbrev=0 --tags)" export PATH=$QTBINPATH:$PATH
rm -rf $HOME/build_prod/ mkdir $HOME/build_prod
cd $TRAYDIR ./configure --maintainer="$MAINTAINER" --maintainer-email="$MAINTAINER_EMAIL" PKGNAME="subutai-control-center.deb"
nproc_count="$(nproc)" core_number=$((nproc_count*2+1)) subutai_control_center_bin="subutai_control_center_bin"
if [ -d "$subutai_control_center_bin" ]; then echo "Try to remove subutai_control_center_bin" rm -rf subutai_control_center_bin fi mkdir subutai_control_center_bin cd subutai_control_center_bin lrelease ../SubutaiControlCenter.pro qmake ../SubutaiControlCenter.pro -r -spec linux-g++ make -j$core_number rm *.o *.cpp *.h mv ../*.qm . cd ../
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then cd deb-packages/deb-packages-internal ./clear.sh ./pack_debian.sh cd ../..
cd $HOME/build_prod cp /tmp/jenkins_slave/workspace/tag.builders/tray_linux.subutai-io.tag/deb-packages/*.deb . cp /tmp/jenkins_slave/workspace/tag.builders/tray_linux.subutai-io.tag/deb-packages/deb-packages-internal/debian/SubutaiControlCenter/bin/subutai-control-center .
mv *.deb subutai-control-center.deb mv subutai-control-center SubutaiControlCenter
FILE=/home/builder/build_prod/subutai-control-center.deb URL=https://eu0.cdn.subutai.io:8338/kurjun/rest USER=jenkins EMAIL=jenkins@subut.ai PUBLICKEY=$(gpg --armor --export $EMAIL) curl -k "$URL/auth/token?user=$USER" -o /tmp/filetosign rm -rf /tmp/filetosign.asc gpg --armor -u $EMAIL --clearsign /tmp/filetosign TOKEN=$(curl -k -s -Fmessage="`cat /tmp/filetosign.asc`" -Fuser=$USER "$URL/auth/token") echo "-k -v -H \"token: $TOKEN\" -Ffile=@$FILE \"$URL/raw/upload\"" curl -k -v -H "token: $TOKEN" -Ffile=@$FILE -Fversion=$tray_version -Ftoken=$TOKEN "$URL/raw/upload"
FILE=/home/builder/build_prod/SubutaiControlCenter URL=https://eu0.cdn.subutai.io:8338/kurjun/rest USER=jenkins EMAIL=jenkins@subut.ai PUBLICKEY=$(gpg --armor --export $EMAIL) curl -k "$URL/auth/token?user=$USER" -o /tmp/filetosign rm -rf /tmp/filetosign.asc gpg --armor -u $EMAIL --clearsign /tmp/filetosign TOKEN=$(curl -k -s -Fmessage="`cat /tmp/filetosign.asc`" -Fuser=$USER "$URL/auth/token") echo "-k -v -H \"token: $TOKEN\" -Ffile=@$FILE \"$URL/raw/upload\"" curl -k -v -H "token: $TOKEN" -Ffile=@$FILE -Fversion=$tray_version -Ftoken=$TOKEN "$URL/raw/upload"
